means: 对（某事物）作最低估计，极力贬低（某事物）的价值[重要性]

sentence.Network_cn: 相关人员希望尽可能降低罹癌风险。

sentence.Network_cn: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

sentence.Network_en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

means.word_mean: 把...估计得最低,极度轻视,贬低

encyclopedia.content: 一款桌面辅助小工具， 您最小化窗口时，miniMIZE 会将窗口以缩略图的形式，并按照您的设置排列在桌的任意位置。如果某个窗口还想显示在任务栏，可通过添加拒绝项目来完成。 注意：该软件只能运行在 XP 系统上。

entry.tran: 使减至最低程度;使保持最低程度
entry.def: If you minimize a risk, problem, or unpleasant situation, you reduce it to the lowest possible level, or prevent it increasing beyond that level.

example.ex: Concerned people want to minimize the risk of developing cancer...
example.tran: 相关人员希望尽可能降低罹癌风险。

example.ex: Many of these problems can be minimised by sensible planning.
example.tran: 这些问题很多可以通过合理安排尽可能避免。

entry.tran: 对…轻描淡写；使显得不重要
entry.def: If you minimize something, you make it seem smaller or less significant than it really is.

example.ex: Some have minimized the importance of ideological factors...
example.tran: 有些人淡化了意识形态因素的重要性。

example.ex: At his trial, he tried to minimize his behavior.
example.tran: 接受审判的时候，他企图对自己的行为轻描淡写。

entry.tran: 把(计算机屏幕上的窗口)最小化
entry.def: If you minimize a window on a computer screen, you make it very small, because you do not want to use it.

example.ex: Click the square icon again to minimize the window.
example.tran: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

means.word_mean: 2. represent as less significant or important

auth_sentence.content: The extraneous points that minimize the length of the network locally are...called Steiner points.

auth_sentence.res_content: By filtering water through its porous soils, a forest can minimize wastewater treatment costs.

auth_sentence.res_content: To minimize discomfort, each tent is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To minimize discomfort, each tent is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]男→adj.管理的,行政的
minister部长+y表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后→ministry部门

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理, 经营, 行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]→n.管理, 经营, 行政部门
mini小+ature表名词→小物品→小画象
mini小+ster人→小人→古代大臣称呼自己"小人"→部长,大臣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予
使减少到最少,使降到最低
stems_affixes.word_buile: minim[n.极小之物;半音符]+ize表动词→减少到最少
di分开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少

Sentence.sentence: Textbook versions are constantly updated, motivating publishers by minimizing production costs (the big ones like McGraw-Hill are already on board).

sentences.en: You can minimize the dangers of driving by taking care to obey the rules of the road.
sentences.cn: 严格遵守交通规则, 你就能把行车危险降到最低点。

means.word_mean: 对(某事物)作最低估计; 极力贬低(某事物)的价值[重要性]

sentences.en: He minimized the value of her contribution to his research so that he got all the praise.
sentences.cn: 他极力贬低她在那项研究中的贡献, 从而独获全部奖励。

jushi.english: He minimized the value of her contribution to his research so that he got all the praise.
jushi.chinese: 他极力贬低她在那项研究中的贡献，从而独获全部奖励。

jushi.english: You can minimize the dangers of driving by taking care to obey the rules of the road.
jushi.chinese: 严格遵守交通规则，你就能把行车危险降到最低点。
